tooltip.eraser.zero_health_eraser: This will spam setHealth(0) several times.
tooltip.eraser.crash_eraser: This will crash the other player's Minecraft client.
tooltip.eraser.respawn_eraser: This will respawn the opposing player.
message.eraser.disconnect: You were erased with an eraser.
message.eraser.re_login: [Eraser] If the deletion hasn’t taken effect, try relogging.
